climbs.name: Kimi Crack
climbs.fa: Wayne Augusto, Tina Cobos and Kevin Keith 2/2020

content.description: Climb a crack that varies in size to gain a wider section that is bolt protected. Continue on face out right to top of cliff. A single large staple is the anchor.
content.location: Just right of the black water streak

climbs.name: A Close Shave
climbs.fa: Kevin Keith, Peter Kohl and Wayne Augusto

content.description: This route is the furthest right of the bolted slab routes. Scramble up on top of a boulder to start the route. Fairly straight forward climbing leads to an unreasonable shallow dish that protects well. Good luck figuring out a workable sequence to eek through the Granite Dells weirdness. continue up to a staple at the top of the cliff or move right to a chain anchor.
content.location: Furthest right or westerly bolted slab route.

content.description: This wall is climber's right of the Wall of Voodoo just uphill a bit. Currently there are about  ten routes establishes from about 5.4 to 5.11-. The rock quality is really good. Several of the routes are traditional with a few bolts. The center clean part of the wall is really fun sport climbing from 5.8-5.11ish.  Great outing in a more private setting.
